scripts.clean: rm -rf test-results && rm -rf playwright-report && rm -rf junit-results
scripts.test: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium --config=./playwright.config.ts
scripts.test-headed: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium --config=./playwright.config.ts --headed
scripts.test-visual: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=visual --config=./playwright.config.ts
